unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my MA exams at Delhi University. My anxiety was through the roof! A friend suggested a mental health app. Honestly, I was skeptical. But it helped me track my mood, especially after stressful family get-togethers like Diwali. It's no "3 Idiots" miracle cure, but it's a starting point, like the Isha Foundation's Inner Engineering program.
